definition: preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
norm/standard/standard of reference/base/base point/base line/benchmark/reference point/reference frame/criterion/data
to aim at/to target/to point at/to be directed at/registration/alignment (mechanical engineering)
to identify clearly/to make sure of/to believe firmly

sentences.english: Semi-precious stones were used for inlay ornamentation.
sentences.chinese: 準寶石的石頭用來做鑲嵌裝飾。

sentences.english: Chapter V, studies of the formation mechanism of the tourism quasi-tourists market.
sentences.chinese: 第五章，研究旅遊準市場的形成機理。

sentences.english: The cost compensation for quasi-public goods has been the focus of attention in public finance circles.
sentences.chinese: 準公共產品的成本補償一直是財政界關注的一個問題。

sentences.english: Not so long ago I was an expectant father.
sentences.chinese: 不久以前我還是一名準爸爸。

sentences.english: The demons begged Jesus to let them go into them, and he gave them permission.
sentences.chinese: 鬼央求耶穌，準他們進入豬裏去。

sentences.english: A wavelet-based electrocardiogram data semi-lossless compression algorithm was proposed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 提出了基於小波變換的心電信號準無損壓縮算法。

sentences.english: The phenomenon of "quasi-overload" has been found in the experiments.
sentences.chinese: 實驗還發現了所謂的“準超負荷”的現象。

sentences.english: The easy route is to have a simple password that works everywhere. Unfortunately, this can be a problem.
sentences.chinese: 你可以圖方便設置統一的密碼，但這麼幹，準會出事。

sentences.english: Atcheson's company and its competitors screen the driving records of prospective borrowers.
sentences.chinese: 艾奇遜的公司和屏幕準借款人的駕駛記錄其競爭對手。

sentences.english: An example of quasi-contract can be found in the Wikipedia website .
sentences.chinese: 有關準合約的例子，請參閱維基百科。

sentences.english: The research of tourism quasi-market is raised in order to resolve the issue.
sentences.chinese: 旅遊準市場的研究就是爲了解決這種問題而提出的。

sentences.english: A man with "expectant father" written all over him.
sentences.chinese: 一個身上插滿“準爸爸”標籤的男人。

sentences.english: The coarse waste can be automatically excluded; the operation is auto metical.
sentences.chinese: 雜質粗料自動排除，可以實現準自動化作業。

sentences.english: Drawing sketches is the basic drill of future engineers.
sentences.chinese: 畫圖紙是這些準工程師的基礎功。

sentences.english: Dad offered me the car to job hunt.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸給我買了一輛準燕趙車友會找工作用。

sentences.english: If you want to win Tom's heart， make him a cheesecake.
sentences.chinese: 若是你想討湯姆歡心，做起司蛋糕給他喫準沒錯。

definition: preparation/to prepare/to intend/to be about to/reserve (fund)
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip

mark/sign/label/to mark with a symbol, label, lettering etc/to bear (a brand name, registration number etc)/prize/award/bid/target/quota/(old) the topmost branches of a tree/visible symptom/classifier for military units
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
to decide (to do something)/to resolve/decision/CL:個|个[ge4],項|项[xiang4]/certainly
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
